summary: The gRPC DEADLINE_EXCEEDED error message is cryptic and doesn't help users troubleshoot. The request is to improve the error message to provide context and link to documentation about common causes and solutions.
userImpact: Users encountering gRPC timeouts receive unhelpful error messages that don't guide them toward troubleshooting steps or solutions.
rootCause: The raw gRPC error message 'context deadline exceeded' lacks context about why it occurred and how to resolve it.
proposedFix: Wrap the gRPC deadline error with a more helpful message that explains common causes and links to documentation (https://docs.temporal.io/docs/typescript/troubleshooting/#grpc-call-timeouts-context-deadline-exceeded).
resolutionDetails: Issue was closed in favor of #365, indicating it was merged with another related issue on the same topic.
keyQuote: Log something like: Error: gRPC call timeout. This can happen for a number of reasons. Please see: https://docs.temporal.io/docs/typescript/troubleshooting/#grpc-call-timeouts-context-deadline-exceeded
